name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
schedule:
第二週：Overview
第三~五週：
• The Origins of Quantum Mechanics 
--- The failures of classical physics
--- Wave–particle duality
第六~第八週：
• The Dynamics of Microscopic Systems 
--- The Schrödinger equation
--- The Born interpretation of the wavefunction
• Quantum Mechanical Principles 
--- The information in a wavefunction
--- The uncertainty principle
--- The postulates of quantum mechanics
第九週：1st Examination (45%)
第十週：
• Unfinished part
• A particle in a box
第十一~十六週：
• The Rates of Chemical Reactions
--- Experimental techniques
--- The rates of reactions
--- Integrated rate laws
--- Reactions approaching equilibrium
--- The temperature dependence of reaction rates
--- Elementary reactions
--- Consecutive elementary reactions
--- Unimolecular reaction
• Kinetics of Complex Reaction
第十七週：2nd Examination (45%)
第十八週：Make-up Day
scorePolicy:
成績評量：
• 兩次考試 各佔 45 % ，平時分數 10 % 
• 點名不到一次扣學期總分5分，超過4次學期成績總分為59
materials:
Text Book: 
Physical Chemistry, Atkins’, Oxford University Press 2006, 8th ed. (歐亞)
